thread.title: Man jailed for string of sex offences against children
thread.title_full: Man jailed for string of sex offences against children | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Man jailed for string of sex offences against children
text:
Michael Roles has been jailed for 18 years Credit: Lincolnshire Police A man who was found guilty of 15 counts of sexual assault against children has been jailed.
64-year-old Michael Roles, from Bridlington, was sentenced to 18 years in prison after a court found him guilty of a range of offences, including the rape of a child under 13, the attempted rape of a child under 13, indecent assault and other similar offences against children.
The victim's families will never forget the horror of what has happened, but I hope the conclusion of this case today and the jailing of this evil man will bring them a degree of closure and that they can start to rebuild their lives.
â€“ Detective Constable Trish Wells Last updated Fri 17 Feb 2017 Bridlington East Yorkshire
